Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/69th
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 63rd, Damen, 69th, and Western due to, street blockage near Western/69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 63rd, Damen, 69th, and Western due to, street blockage near Western/69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/79th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove, 76th, and King Dr due to, street blockage near King Drive/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Cottage Grove, 76th, and King Dr due to, street blockage near King Drive/79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Pulaski. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
